extendedInfo.description: Compare top travel sites @ once & save up to 75% on travel!This easy-to-use app connects to CompareBookings.com and combines travel rates from top travel websites for you to find the lowest rates from top providers online. CB's ultimate travel application contains three main Channels:Channel (1): CB's Hotel Search Engine:With integrated mapping and smart sorting and filters for search results, you can now quickly find hotels locally, by airport, or at thousands of destinations across the globe. Every hotel is supported with an extensive array of information that includes hotel descriptions, user ratings, and a vast library of images, allowing you to choose which hotel and which travel site to book on, with the utmost efficiency.CB's Hotel Search Engine offers a customizable experience, in which you can control the number of hotels returned, distance units and the radius within which hotels appear. In addition, you can also choose from a long list of currencies to view hotel prices in.Channel (2): CB's Compare Travel Sites:Compare discounts from top travel sites with one simple search and reveal the best flight, hotel, cruise and/or car rental provider for your request! This channel was made to help travelers easily locate the best deals from the best travel suppliers for each particular request.Our team of experts analyze the various travel sites based on a number of strict criteria and only include companies that are truly offering great service and value to consumers.These are then sorted according to the likelihood that they will offer the best travel options for that particular request.Channel (3): CB's Tours & Up-To-Date Deals:This channel was designed with a unique technology to give travelers the opportunity to find perfect tours & get the latest deals from the best travel suppliers as soon as they are announced.Our travel deals host promotions for thousands of global hotels, cruises, car rentals and other travel suppliers.Deals are updated around the clock, to make sure that travelers never miss a great deal ever again!The goal of CB's Up-To-Date Deals is to be the best single source for the latest aggregated travel deals online!â¢ To learn more about the company, feel free to visit: CompareBookings.com.
